en.already_paired: This device has already been paired.
en.autostart_after_message: Automatically start the bridge service, in seconds.
en.certification_benefits: Another benefit to using certified plugins is, HOOBS support. Since HOOBS tests certified plugins, we are familiar with the plugin and can help troubleshoot issues. And in the event where the plugins is broke, we can work with the plugin developer on your behalf to help address the issue.
en.certification_program: The HOOBS certification program helps promote plugins that work. We work with the plugin developer to address issues, and help keep the plugins simple and easy to configure.
en.config_reboot_confirm: You need to reboot for these changes to take effect.
en.confirm_action: Are you sure you want to continue?
en.confirm_exit: Are you sure you want to leave?
en.confirm_factory_reset: Are you sure you want to reset this device?
en.confirm_reboot: Are you sure you want to reboot this device?
en.confirm_refresh: Are you sure you want to refresh?
en.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this device?
en.confirm_restart: Are you sure you want to restart the bridge?
en.country_code_message: Set the country code to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
en.device_address: Enter the IP address your HOOBS device
en.device_hostname: Assign a name for this device
en.end_port_invalid: End port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
en.factory_reset_message: Warning, this can not be undone.
en.help_welcome: HOOBS is an ecosystem that aims to unify and simplfy the "Smart Home". We beilive that you should be able to use the devices you want, and not be locked into one provider's solution. If you want to use Google Home for your voice control and Apple Home for your routines, go ahead, HOOBS will make tht happen for you. HOOBS can connect your devices togeather by the use of plugins. HOOBS has "Certified Plugins", and it supports Homebridge plugins. This means you have over 1,000 choices when it comes to your Smart Home tech.
en.home_pin_message: The PIN used when adding Homebridge to Apple Home.
en.home_username_message: The username Apple Home uses to identify Homebridge.
en.homekit_disconnect: You will be disconnected from Apple Home.
en.hoobs_unavailable: HOOBS is not available on this device.
en.invalid_mac_address: This device doesn't have a valid MAC address.
en.invalid_port_range: Invalid port range the ending port must be greater then the starting port.
en.latitude_message: Set the latitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
en.longitude_message: Set the longitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
en.name: Name
en.plugin_select_device: Select a device to install this plugin.
en.polling_seconds_invalid: Refresh interval is invalid. It must be an integer between 1 second and 30 minutes.
en.polling_seconds_message: Refresh the accessory states interval in seconds.
en.postal_code_message: Set the postal code to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
en.range_name_message: A port range description used to identify the port range.
en.server_port_invalid: Server port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
en.server_port_message: Set the main port the server runs on.
en.service_description_message: Used with the name to help identify the Homebridge on the system.
en.service_name_message: Used to identify the Homebridge service on the system.
en.service_port_invalid: Service port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
en.service_port_message: The port Homebridge runs on, the default is 51826.
en.start_port_invalid: Start port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
en.temp_units_message: Set the units you want temprature sensors to display.
en.time_format_message: This only affects times in the interface.
